metadata.title: RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H: Sample software (driver software generation)

sections.content:
Question:
Do you provide an example source code for driver software?
Answer:
Driver software that controls internal hardware can be automatically generated by the Flexible Software Package (FSP). FSP can be obtained from GitHub:
RZ/T2H: https://github.com/renesas/rzt-fsp
RZ/N2H: https://github.com/renesas/rzn-fsp
Suitable Products
RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H
